abstract: New York City Police Officer Jonathan Munoz is charged with official misconduct and lying on criminal complaint for incident in which he arrested man who was filming him and other officers; disputes between officers and citizens who wish to film them have become common of late, and sometimes they end in arrests for disordely conduct.
lead_paragraph: Officer Jonathan Munoz was charged with official misconduct and lying on a criminal complaint after his arrest of a 21-year-old man outside a Washington Heights nightspot in March.

headline.main: New York Officer Is Charged in Arrest of Man Who Tried to Film Him
headline.print_headline: Officer Is Charged in Arrest of Man Who Tried to Film Him

snippet: Officer Jonathan Munoz was charged with official misconduct and lying on a criminal complaint after his arrest of a 21-year-old man outside a Washington Heights nightspot in March.
